mapper.sql: SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_YHBH, a.F_TYPE, CASE F_TYPE WHEN '3' THEN '查询' WHEN '2' THEN '修改' WHEN '1' THEN '删除' WHEN '0' THEN '增加' END AS F_TYPE0, a.F_TABLE_NAME, a.F_TABLE_ID, a.F_COMMENT, date_format(a.F_OPERATION_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_OPERATION_TIME, b.F_NAME, date_format(a.F_CRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CRDATE ,date_format(a.F_CHDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CHDATE
FROM es_operation_log a LEFT JOIN es_user b ON a.F_YHBH = b.F_YHBH
mapper.select:
1=1
and CONCAT(a.`f_username`,'##',a.`f_rolemc`) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%')
